AI Description: ATAC-seq pipeline is a computational workflow designed for the analysis of Assay for Transposase-Accessible Chromatin using sequencing (ATAC-seq) data. It includes processing steps for quality control, alignment, peak calling, and downstream analysis of chromatin accessibility data.
Core Features: Quality Control Of Sequencing Data, Alignment Of Reads To The Reference Genome, Identification Of Open Chromatin Regions (Peaks), Annotation & Visualization Of Atac-Seq Results
